questions.question: 毎朝７時に（＿）。
questions.hint:
Time + に - indicates specific time
毎朝（まいあさ） - every morning

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉

「まいあさ７時におきます」 means "I wake up at 7 every morning."

  • ねます - sleep
  • やすみます - rest
  • おわります - finish
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect
Only おきます makes sense as the action for "every morning at 7."

questions.question: きのうデパートでシャツを（＿）。
questions.hint:
Place + で - action location
Object + を - direct object marker

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉
「シャツを買いました」 means "I bought a shirt."

  • 作りました - made
  • 歩きました - walked
  • 飲みました - drank
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect
「買いました」 is the only logical action for shopping.

questions.question: 駅（＿）電車にのります。
questions.hint:
Place + で - where the action takes place
電車にのる - board a train

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉
「駅で電車にのります」 means "I board the train at the station."

  • に - destination marker
  • を - object marker
  • の - possessive "of"
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect
「で」 is used to show where the action happens, in this case, boarding at the station.

questions.question: この本は（＿）です。
questions.hint:
Noun + は + Adjective
Books are often described by weight or thickness.

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉
「重い（おもい）」 means "heavy" — a natural adjective for books.

  • 遠い - far
  • 低い - low
  • 近い - near
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect
「重い」 fits the context best for describing a book’s physical feature.

questions.question: 友達とレストラン（＿）ご飯を食べます。

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉
「レストランで」 means "at the restaurant" — where the action occurs.

  • に - destination
  • へ - direction
  • を - object marker
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect
「で」 correctly marks the place where the eating happens.
